<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: This template defines a user story<br/>
title: &lsquo;&rsquo;<br/>
labels: &lsquo;&rsquo;</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: [Title]&rsquo;<br/>
labels: new</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> [role],<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> [function],<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> [benefit].</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>[Document what you know]</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given [some context],
When [certain action is taken],
Then [the outcome of action is observed]</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Implement Login Feature&rsquo;<br/>
labels: new</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> a login feature,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can access my account.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>The login feature should support email and password authentication.</li>
<li>It should include a &ldquo;Remember Me&rdquo; option.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given a registered user,
When they enter correct credentials,
Then they should be able to log in successfully.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Add Search Functionality&rsquo;<br/>
labels: backlog</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> a search functionality,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can find specific information quickly.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>The search should support keywords and filters.</li>
<li>It should display results in a user-friendly format.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given a search input,
When a user enters a keyword,
Then relevant results should be displayed.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Improve Page Load Speed&rsquo;<br/>
labels: technical debt</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> faster page load speeds,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I have a better user experience.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>Optimize images and scripts.</li>
<li>Implement caching strategies.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given an optimized page,
When a user loads the page,
Then the load time should be less than 2 seconds.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Create User Profile Page&rsquo;<br/>
labels: icebox</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> a user profile page,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can view and edit my personal information.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>The profile page should display user details and allow editing.</li>
<li>It should be secure and user-friendly.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given a user profile page,
When a user views their profile,
Then they should see their personal information and be able to edit it.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Set Up Continuous Integration&rsquo;<br/>
labels: new</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> developer,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> continuous integration set up,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can ensure code quality and automated testing.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>Integrate with a CI/CD tool like Jenkins or GitHub Actions.</li>
<li>Automate testing and deployment processes.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given continuous integration setup,
When code is pushed to the repository,
Then automated tests and deployments should be triggered.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Design Homepage Layout&rsquo;<br/>
labels: backlog</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> an intuitive homepage layout,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can navigate the site easily.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>The layout should be responsive and user-friendly.</li>
<li>Include key features and links.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given a homepage layout,
When a user visits the homepage,
Then they should find it easy to navigate and access important features.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Optimize Database Queries&rsquo;<br/>
labels: technical debt</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> developer,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> optimized database queries,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> the application runs more efficiently.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>Identify and optimize slow queries.</li>
<li>Use indexing and other optimization techniques.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given optimized queries,
When a user performs data-related actions,
Then the response time should be significantly improved.</code></pre>


<hr />

<hr />

<p>name: User Story<br/>
about: Template for creating user stories<br/>
title: &lsquo;User Story: Implement Password Reset&rsquo;<br/>
labels: new</p>

<h2 id="assignees%3A-%27%27">assignees: &lsquo;&rsquo;  </h2>

<p><strong>As a</strong> user,<br/>
<strong>I need</strong> a password reset feature,<br/>
<strong>So that</strong> I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.</p>

<h3 id="details-and-assumptions">Details and Assumptions</h3>

<ul>
<li>The feature should include email verification.</li>
<li>It should be secure and easy to use.</li>
</ul>


<h3 id="acceptance-criteria">Acceptance Criteria</h3>

<pre><code class="gherkin">Given a password reset feature,
When a user requests a password reset,
Then they should receive an email with reset instructions and be able to reset their password.</code></pre>
